attributes.action: Put pressure on Egg to reduce to zero the interest on the 161,000 accounts they have just closed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Egg have invoked article 20.2 which is a 35 day notice period that allows them to end the agreement to supply credit.

They claim this is because the 161,000 people they have done this to are "high risk".

If this is the case, then I feel Egg should "help" these people by reducing there interest to 0% to allow them to more quickly repay their debts and to help Egg recover the money it clearly has lost.
